creator: wsmoak@apache.org
text:
Log4j javadocs have broken links to JDK 1.3 docs on Sun's site.

Example, on this page:
http://logging.apache.org/log4j/docs/api/org/apache/log4j/helpers/AbsoluteTimeDa
teFormat.html

The 'Date' link points to:
http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/1.3/docs/api/java/util/Date.html
which does not exist.

creator: billbruns@yahoo.com
text:
These links are broken because Sun has removed the base URL 
of "http://java.sun.com/products/jdk/" and replaced it with
"http://java.sun.com/j2se/".
Many other Apache javadocs, such as those for Tomcat, typically do not contain 
links back to the Sun documentation.  Thus, they are immune from this sort of 
problem.

See patch attached to bug 27817.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27817 ***
creator: mprice@atl.lmco.com
